constituent: squad, sword, spear, cutlass, king, jewel, ball, king2, jewel2, ball2
koohiiStory1: Am I the only one who took this as penis and balls? In order to be in the man-squad, naturally you need to have two balls with your "spear" in the middle there.
koohiiStory2: Here we have two kings trying out for the cheer-leading squad. A spear on the floor separates their dancing areas.
